casebody.data:
NORTH CAROLINA RESPIRATORY CARE BOARD
v.
KIGHT'S MEDICAL CORPORATION, And more particularly, John A. Kight, in his capacity as President and Chief Executive Officer. No. 256P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2007. K. Edward Greene, Sarah M. Johnson, Raleigh, for Medical Corp. William R. Shenton, Christopher P. Brewer, Raleigh, for Respiratory Board.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendants on the 31st day of May 2007 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th day of October 2007."
